project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design and implement a Python-based quiz game that quizzes users with multiple-choice questions, keeps track of their scores, and displays the score at the end.

task.name: Define the structure for quiz questions and answers
Implement the main game loop to ask questions and get user input
Implement score tracking for the user's correct answers
Implement the functionality to display the user's score at the end of the game
Write tests for each of the functionalities implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
